description: This Python source file defines a class 'ShellTools' that provides functionality to run shell commands and capture their output, with logging and error handling.

classes.name: ShellTools
classes.description: A class that extends Toolkit to provide shell command execution capabilities with logging and output handling.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the ShellTools instance, setting the base directory and registering the run_shell_command method.

methods.name: run_shell_command
methods.description: Executes a shell command with arguments, captures output, logs execution details, and handles errors.
